attributes.action: Should woman have their marital status on view to the world - ie. Mrs (Married), Miss (unmarried), when the same does not apply to men
attributes.additional_details:
Should woman have their marital status on view to the world - ie. Mrs (Married), Miss (unmarried), when the same does not apply to men.
When a boy turns 18, he changes from a Master to a Mr. Can woman be the same - ie when a girl turns 18 changing from a Miss to a Ms, or Madame, or Lady, Mrs.
The point is can we not all be the same, rather than be differenciated from men.
